name: NuGetToolInstaller
description: Finds or downloads and caches specified version spec of NuGet and adds it to the PATH.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Version spec of version to get.

If you want to match a pre-release version, the spec MUST contain a pre-release label and their major, minor, and patch versions MUST match.

List of available versions obtained from [here](http://dist.nuget.org/tools.json).

Examples: 4.x, 3.3.x, 2.8.6, >=4.0.0-0

messages.Info_ExpectBehaviorChangeWhenUsingVersio: You are using a query match on the version string. Behavior changes or breaking changes might occur as NuGet updates to a new version.
messages.Error_NoVersionWasFoundWhichMatches: No version was found which matches the input %s
messages.Error_NoUrlWasFoundWhichMatches: No download URL was found for %s
